ygData.subject: Re: PoA bard quests plus a rant
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh you realize the quests in planes are no diffrent? It s more tedious actually. The same mobs you hunt drop the quest components you turn them in and get a
ygData.messageBody:
Heh you realize the quests in planes are no diffrent? It's more tedious
actually. The same mobs you hunt drop the quest components you turn them in
and get a item. Besides which more then half of them are broken.

Naeeldar

-----Original Message-----
From: Kimes, Dean W. <Dean_Kimes@...>
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com' <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, January 24, 2000 4:40 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] PoA bard quests plus a rant


>From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
>
>> Its really frustrating hearing about all the new quests on the plane
>> of sky when quests are my favorite part of the game. Lame as many of
them
>> are they are still more fun than camping.
>
>>The quests are my favorite parts of the game too. If it were not for
>>them and a very small handful of wonderful people on my server, I'd have
>>left the game long ago.
>>Kitsune Daiskoshi, Ranger of 33 seasons
>>Chortles Pyka, Bard of 21 seasons
>>Melancholy Diverted, Quellious Server
>
>I definitely agree there. Without quests and my friends I have made in the
>game I wouldn't be playing any more either. It isn't EQ that keeps me
>playing any more, its the people I know who play EQ. That can only carry
>one so far I fear.
>
> Kit
